author: newsr.in
title: Lindsay Lohan Announces She’ll Run for US President in 2020, Thanks to Kanye West
text: Lindsay Lohan’s acting career may have hit the skids but she’s not afraid to dream big. Now living in London full time because she found the attention she got from the paparazzi and the media in both LA and NYC too much, Lohan is ready to make her comeback into the spotlight, big time. No, she’s not about to blow our minds with a movie performance the kind she hasn’t delivered in years, and no, she’s not about to use the attention she still gets to become more involved in ... »
